org.xflatdb.xflat.db

Class TableBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.db.TableBase<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConvertingTable, ElementTable

    public abstract class TableBase<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for implementations of Table. This provides dependencies to table implementations that are injected by the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected TableBase(java.lang.Class<T> tableType, java.lang.String tableName)
      Creates a new Table for the given table type and name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected <T> T doWithEngine(EngineAction<T> action)
      Performs an action with an engine obtained from the EngineProvider.
      protected IdGenerator getIdGenerator()
      Gets the ID generator used by this table to generate IDs for objects that do not already have them.
      protected java.lang.String getTableName()
      Gets the table's name.
      protected java.lang.Class<T> getTableType()
      Gets the class of the items in the table.
      void setIdGenerator(IdGenerator idGenerator)
      Injects the ID generator used by this table to generate IDs for objects that do not already have them.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getIdGenerator

        protected IdGenerator getIdGenerator()
        Gets the ID generator used by this table to generate IDs for objects that do not already have them.
        Returns:
        The ID generator used by the table.

      • doWithEngine

        protected <T> T doWithEngine(EngineAction<T> action)
        Performs an action with an engine obtained from the EngineProvider. Also wraps the action in some special engine error handling.

        Beware that the action may be executed multiple times depending on the retry logic of this method.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type of the action.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to perform.
        Returns:
        The value returned by the action.
